data.title: GILBERT (Pierre) The Forest of Cippes. Essays of Critici…
data.meta_description:
GILBERT (Pierre)
The Forest of Cippes. Essays of Criticism.  Volume I. The Prince of Line. Racine. Boileau. The politics of Richelieu. Bernardin de Saint Pierre. J.J. Rousseau. Chateaubriand. Stendhal. Plea for Emma Rouault, Woman Bovary. Semitism in the Theatre. Jules Lemaitre. Anatole France. Paul Bourget. Maurice Barrès. Jacques Bainville. Léon Daudet. Pierre Lasserre. Charles Maurras. "L' ora del tempo". Definitions & Principles. With a portrait of the author. Volume II. Classical theater. Corneille. Racine. Moliere. Marivaux. Jean Moréas. Chronicle of the stage in 1912. Generalizations. Alfred Capus. Maurice Donnay. Eugène Brieux. Paul Hervieu. Henry Bataille. Henri Lavedan. François de Curel. Dramatic Ideas and the Work of Albert Guinon. Appendix. With a folded facsimile of writing out of text. Introduction and notes by his friend E. M. (Eugène Marsan). Paris, Édouard Champion, 1918.   2 vol. in-8, bradel binding in marbled paper, covers on board, untrimmed (period binding).
Posthumous first edition of these articles published in Action Française and Revue Critique. Pierre Gilbert is the pseudonym of Pierre Gilbert Crabos. A nice copy, well bound. Bookplate of the poet René Chalupt.
Attached : MORTIER (Alfred), Ruzzante (1502-1542). A popular playwright of the Italian Renaissance. Paris, Peyronnet et cie, 1925. 2 vol. in-8 paperbacks, printed covers.
A set of 4 volumes.
